ftp.rsommerard

Class FtpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ftp.rsommerard.FtpRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FtpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Created by Romain on 27/01/15. Traite les commandes entrantes.
